attributes.action: Cut Chiled benefits [any other unnecessary benefits] or give my tax back
attributes.additional_details: Dont know how this systems works but i need some answers.I see stories now&then like  £30000 benefits isn't enough for 34yr old mum who has 10kids.I respect&appreciate that the government is trying to help people.I dont think its government money.Its my money&hard working people’s.I work hard to get £2000/month.After tax i get around £1500.Government is taking the money from people who work hard&give it to youngmums (who opens legs twice an year).It isnt fair.Please stop this or give my tax back.I know that all the money given to the child benefits are not mine but i believe at the least i have contributed towards that in 0.000000000001%.it is taken out from my hard work&given to scum bags without my permission i think it is against my human rights. I cant fight on my own so i want people to help me out. I need some sort of response.This country is going downhill. Just please stop taxing me&my hard work. I want to work for my family not for anyother ridiculous scum bag family
